attributes.action: Prohibit public servants having any conections with the world economic forum.
attributes.additional_details: The government's involvement with special interest groups such as the World Economic Forum is anti-democratic, and has the potential to influence the direction of government policy without public knowledge or consent. This could lead to a subversion of the Government and its institutions.
attributes.background: To put a law in place which would completely prohibit any public servant/government/politician  from being involved either directly or indirectly with any special interest groups such as the World Economic Forum and implementing any of their agendas as public policy.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701885
